Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: Uye dai Tenzi vako vaida, vaiita vanhu vose boka rimwe (vari vechitendero chimwe, Islaam), asi (vanhu) havambosiyi kusawirirana

Kunze kweuyo akapuhwa tsitsi naTenzi vako, uye izvozvo ndizvo zvavakavasikira (kupa tsitsi kavaiiti vezvakanaka, uye kuranga vaiiti vezvakaipa). Uye shoko raTenzi vako rakazadziswa (nekuti): “Zvirokwazvo ndichazadza Gehena nemaJinn (mashavi) nevanhu pamwechete.”

Uye zvose zvatinokuudza iwe (Muhammad (SAW)) kubva kunhau dzevatumwa ndezvekuti tive tinosimbisa moyo wako nadzo. Uye muichi (chikamu cheQur’aan) chokwadi chauya kwauri, uye yambiro neyeuchidzo kuvatendi
Iti kune avo vasingatendi: “Itai muitiro wenyu, isu tirikuita (muitiro wedu).”

Uye Allah ndivo muridzi wezvakavanzika zvekumatenga nepanyika, uye kwavari ndiko kunodzokera hurongwa hwese. Nokudaro vanamate (iwe Muhammad (SAW)) uye vimba navo. Uye Tenzi vako vanoziva zvose zvamunoita

Alif – Laam – Raa. (Mashoko aya ndiwo mamwe ezvishamiso zviri muQur’aan, uye hapana anoziva zvaanoreva kunze kwaAllah (voga)). Idzi indima dzeGwaro riri pachena (rinoburitsa pachena zvinobvumidzwa nezvinorambidzwa, mitemo, nhungamiri uye makomborero)
Zvirokwazvo, takaburutsa iri Qur’aan muchirudzi chechiArabhu kuti muve munorinzwisisa
Tinokutsanangurira iwe (Muhammad (SAW)) nhaurwa dzakanaka kuburikidza muzvizvarurwa zvedu kwauri muQur’aan iri. Uye mushure meizvi (kwekuuya Qur’aan kwauri) waive umwe weavo vasina chavanoziva
(Rangarira) Josefa paakati kuna baba vake: “Imi baba vangu! Zvirokwazvo, ndaona (muhope dzangu) nyeredzi gumi neimwe uye zuva uye mwedzi, ndazviona zvichindipfugamira.”
